objects.specification: A flat horizontal floor plane with a smooth, slightly textured medium gray surface, designed to emulate a durable classroom flooring material with a subtle matte finish.

A vertical rectangular smooth plaster wall finished in a soft light cream color, with a uniform matte paint texture and crisp right-angle edges, providing a clean neutral backdrop typical for an indoor classroom environment.

A vertical rectangular smooth plaster wall finished in a soft light cream color, with a uniform matte paint texture and crisp right-angle edges, providing a clean neutral backdrop typical for an indoor classroom environment.

A vertical rectangular smooth plaster wall finished in a soft light cream color, with a uniform matte paint texture and crisp right-angle edges, providing a clean neutral backdrop typical for an indoor classroom environment.

A vertical rectangular smooth plaster wall finished in a soft light cream color, with a uniform matte paint texture and crisp right-angle edges, providing a clean neutral backdrop typical for an indoor classroom environment.

An executive style teacher desk featuring a large rectangular desktop with a dark wood finish, supported by sturdy side panels and a modesty panel, offering ample workspace and a classic refined look.
An ergonomic swivel office chair upholstered in black leather, with a high backrest, padded armrests, adjustable height mechanism, and a five-point caster base.
A large rectangular frameless whiteboard with glossy white dry-erase surface and slim anodized aluminum trim, designed for wall mounting in front of the classroom.
A slim linear LED light fixture with a white aluminum housing and frosted diffuser, ceiling-mounted for uniform bright illumination across the room.
A slim linear LED light fixture with a white aluminum housing and frosted diffuser, ceiling-mounted for uniform bright illumination across the room.
A slim linear LED light fixture with a white aluminum housing and frosted diffuser, ceiling-mounted for uniform bright illumination across the room.
A slim linear LED light fixture with a white aluminum housing and frosted diffuser, ceiling-mounted for uniform bright illumination across the room.
A tall open wooden bookshelf with a medium brown finish, featuring multiple evenly spaced shelves densely filled with assorted colored hardcover and paperback books arranged vertically.
A large rectangular window with a simple white frame and clear glass panes, allowing natural daylight into the classroom.
Light semi-opaque white fabric curtains with soft folds, hung on either side of the window, providing a gentle decorative accent and light diffusion.
A round analog wall clock with a white face, black hour numerals, slender black metal hands, and a thin black rim, with a simple modern design.
A rectangular educational poster with vibrant illustrative graphics and textual elements, mounted with minimal framing on the wall to provide colorful pedagogical visuals.
A rectangular educational poster with vibrant illustrative graphics and textual elements, mounted with minimal framing on the wall to provide colorful pedagogical visuals.

A decorative potted plant featuring lush green foliage with broad leaves, planted in a simple cylindrical pot with a natural finish, adding a touch of biophilic greenery.
A cylindrical open-top waste bin made of dark gray plastic with a smooth surface, designed for lightweight classroom refuse collection.
A rectangular student desk with a light wood-finished laminate top, slender metal legs in neutral tone, and a modesty panel, offering a compact workspace for individual use.
